name: api_rendering_MeshRenderer
description: Renders the mesh from the MeshFilter component on the same GameObject.

properties.name: additionalVertexStreams
properties.description: Vertex attributes in this mesh will override or add attributes of the primary mesh in the MeshRenderer.

properties.name: enlightenVertexStream
properties.description: Vertex attributes that override the primary mesh when the MeshRenderer uses lightmaps in the Realtime Global Illumination system.

properties.name: globalIlluminationMeshLod
properties.description: Mesh LOD to use for Global Illumination.

properties.name: receiveGI
properties.description: Determines how the object will receive global illumination. (Editor only)

properties.name: scaleInLightmap
properties.description: Specifies the relative lightmap resolution of this object. (Editor only)

properties.name: stitchLightmapSeams
properties.description: When enabled, seams in baked lightmaps will get smoothed. (Editor only)

properties.name: subMeshStartIndex
properties.description: Index of the first sub-mesh to use from the Mesh associated with this MeshRenderer (Read Only).
